resources.string:
Press Start Camera to scan the packaged food.

Please ensure the picture is aligned and clear.

Example:

It can be as personalised as you'd like!

For example:
I'd like to consume more iron and Vitamin C.
I want to avoid sugary foods.

string-array.name: fitness_level
string-array.item: Lightly active (light exercise/sports 1-3 days a week)
Moderately active (moderate exercise/sports 3-5 days a week)
Very active (hard exercise/sports 6-7 days a week)
Super active (very hard exercise/training twice a day)
